channel.title: Characters on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: September art mix
item.description:
Mix of my recently published artworks.

AdMech vs some Heretics fan art

Hey everyone! What I love about AdMech is that if a hand or leg a bit longer than it should be, it’s not a problem it’s an AdMech thing, you know. So yeh, scale might be a little bit off. However I wanted to paint a titan and a dunecrawler in a single battle scene. I hope you like it.

item.title: June Dmitry Brushray 24 Art mix
item.description:
Mix of my artworks June 2024.

Lord Krios the Siegebreaker Had a chance recently to paint some more chaos terminators. This time is a terminator chaos lord of a custom warband. He’s a former Iron Warrior that joined a Word Bearers warband called the Doomed. The image was painted from miniature reference: https://www.instagram.com/p/CwSXAkUtRiV/

And more description taken from there: Poliorkitikos Krios, a former Iron Warrior who joined the ranks of The Doomed warband, has rapidly risen through the command structure when the warband found its combat doctrine lacking in battles of attrition. In times of need Krios is elevated to the rank of Lord Commander but outside campaigns he prefers to go by his Council title “Lord of Siege”. His equipment includes: indomitus-pattern terminator armor salvaged from a slain Imperial Fist captain standard combi-melta with self-calibrating combat optics feeding directly into a split ocular nerve Bane of Bulwarks, a sonic thunderhammer crafted by 𝙙𝙖𝙩𝙖 𝙘𝙤𝙧𝙧𝙪𝙥𝙩𝙚𝙙. The impact of each hit is so severe Krios had to retrofit a powerfist to absorb the raw kinetic force able to rip an astartes arm open.
